TestInfo.name: framework/Samplers/AdaptiveBatch.InvalidBatchStrategy
TestInfo.author: maljdan
TestInfo.description:
An example of using the limit surface post-processor with an invalid batch strategy which will fail with an error message.
Note, all of the tests in AdaptiveBatch operate on a 2D input domain with the goal of extracting a circular limit surface with radius 0.5 and centered at the origin, (0,0).

revisions.revision: Collapsing the batch sampling into the limit surface class, updating documentation, XSD, and the test cases to reflect this change.
First update, looking for more failing tests to add.
